website_summaries.verdict: A jump trainer for a lower price that includes everything you need to exercise.
pros: Despite the low price, this jump trainer is highly durable and holds up after many months of use
2 pairs of resistance bands in different lengths are included
Kit comes with 10 drill cards and links to training videos
cons: Some customers reported issues with the stitching in the ankle cuffs and belt

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy a jump trainer for my 9-year old son but I didn’t think any of them would fit. He’s 5 foot & really skinny, maybe 85lbs And I can’t believe this actually fits. I have him use the longer bands so that it’s not too much resistance for his little legs, and it works great. I’m not sure how it would work on a bigger/taller guy, but I can confidently say it should work for smaller adults, high school/middle school kids, and even tall 4th/5th graders.
customer_reviews.author: ShowTyme

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I have had the belts for 2 years and use them in a strength and conditioning program for college basketball players. The results when used correctly are undeniable and they have held up under maximum usage with extra bands attached. Will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: a voice in the wilderness

customer_reviews.title: Not for kids under 5ft.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 10 yr old son. It’s difficult for him to use. He didn’t like it at all. Was uncomfortable and didn’t stay on his waist well.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Sonny Bui

customer_reviews.title: Extremely uncomfortable and painful
customer_reviews.text: First off I'm pretty objective I like the tough stuff out even if I don't care for it. this product is terrible it is uncomfortable painful and barely even works as far as the function pads are in the wrong place the belt is not that good
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Gruszeczka

customer_reviews.title: You can feel it working
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 son's that love working out and playing sports. I got this to help with leg strengthening. And so far it good.
customer_reviews.author: scott smith

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price. A little uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great value. The only issue are the bungie strap connectors. They connect in an awkward way that digs into the leg when jumping. I recommend wearing longer socks or putting padding around the connectors to reduce the discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: David Ahl

customer_reviews.title: 4 1/2 Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good product. Wear long tights to avoid scratching your skin. Overall great product. I have yet to double up on the bands, however, I look forward to it!
customer_reviews.author: The Fit Lady

customer_reviews.title: Very good trainer
customer_reviews.text: My so has been using these for about a year now. Definitely increasing leg power and vertical. Follow all the drills on you tube to perform. Only question I have is it came with two different size bands. I guess you could use either depending on your height but the short one is really short.
customer_reviews.author: Donald D. Bonelli II

customer_reviews.title: nice workout !
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to wear and its a great workout. I use it to help improve my basketball jump and it definitely has helped! It won't turn you into Michael Jordan but it'll help get you closer!
customer_reviews.author: PetDetective

customer_reviews.title: awesome product! I bought this for leg training and ...
customer_reviews.text: awesome product! I bought this for leg training and lower body muscle building and it is great! Very good if your an athlete ( I used these for cheerleading and my jumps kicked major butt!) or just love exercise . HIGHLY RECOMMENDED

customer_reviews.title: great product, really makes me use my muscles
customer_reviews.text: great product, really makes me use my muscles. there's a learning curve when first learning how to put on item, but after the first time it becomes easier after ever usage

So ladies if you are killen yourself with squats but don't feel or see a difference then I suggest u add this in . For only $20 you really can't complain.

customer_reviews.text: I am still testing these out. The belt does fit a bit funny at the waist and you do need to get used to how these are put on to do different plyometrics as they will annoy your leg if they are bear. Other than that, I loves these and would highly recommend these for getting more resistance for increasing one's vertical jumps.

customer_reviews.text: This is a great workout and training tool. My fiancé uses it to train our two little ones for basketball and I use it to get a great workout in. The straps will fit almost anyone. They may make you walk funny when your getting in position for workout but you will feel the burn soon enough.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice and it is what it said it would be

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's great! The cords are real tight and they give u two sizes

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied. The main problem is the elastics longness that ...
customer_reviews.text: Not satisfied. The main problem is the elastics longness that doesn't allow me (1.86m) to expand them to feel them pushing me down enough... the "not main" problem is that I'm everyday realizing how a squat with weights on my shoulders workout (only as example) might be more useful that the Per4m JT, as the elasticity disperses part of the power you need to apply to the exercise, specially in the first part of the pushing and when the elastics are extended over their pushing capacity. At last, the belt isn't comfortable at all: it's painful if put over the hips, if on the hips it slips down easily (and of course doesn't require enough effort that way).
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Semeniuk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: WOULD NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: This product broke after light use for 3 months. I'm a basketball player who was hoping to use this to train my vertical. I used it a total of 10 times before breaking. I tried contacting the manufacturer but they did not return emails of phone calls. Very disappointed with the customer services. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND. The part that broke was the attachment to the ankle. The manufacturer easily could have sent me a new piece in 2 weeks but did not.

customer_reviews.title: this works well great that's all improvement after a couple weeks
customer_reviews.text: this works well great that's all improvement after a couple weeks. I saw the improvements when I was playing basketball
customer_reviews.author: Peter Benincasa

customer_reviews.title: Good idea with a design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Good idea with a design flaw. The loop for the feet is not adequate. The images show the loop to be worn outside the shoes. If it is indeed used that way, these loops will and does wear out very fast and will fail after several hard exercise sessions. In addition, they often come loose. Secondly, if you wear the loops inside the shoes, during the exercise session, they also have a tendency to come out. Then, the whole stress is applied to the ankle straps causing excessive abrasion to the ankles. I think the loop has to be redesigned. Otherwise, it is a good product and useful.
customer_reviews.author: Guest

customer_reviews.title: Overall It is very good the only thing is that the cords are really ...
customer_reviews.text: This jump trainer was as pictured. Me and my boyfriend use it for basketball training. Overall It is very good the only thing is that the cords are really short so at first it is hard to clip it on. But that is the only con, overall a very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: christine nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Useless afterwards but only discovered this after the 30 day ...
customer_reviews.text: Waist strap made a clean break after a few tries. Useless afterwards but only discovered this after the 30 day return period.

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.title: Great for squats
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product to help with squats to help shape my rear. This product will do just that. The resistance bands are strong and sturdy and will have you burning instantly. I recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.title: its a good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, bought it about 2 months ago and it's still in great shape. I use it when doing squats , makes a noticeable difference in explosiveness but you must be consistent, I use it about 2-3 times a week, still in great condition. Only con would be that the resistance bands rub on your calf but an easy fix is just to wear compression tights or long socks.
customer_reviews.author: roman matthew arteaga

product_meta.title: PER4M Jump Trainer for Athletic and Resistance Training
product_meta.description:
Build explosive power and jumping ability! Perfect for basketball, volleyball, track & field and all manner of athletic and resistance training, the PER4M Jump Trainer maximizes your vertical and horizontal explosiveness by strengthening quads, hips and glutes—the muscles that contribute most to jumping and vertical leap. Increase lower body dynamic strength as a result of adding intensity and consistent positive and negative resistance to jumping, squatting and all manner of lower body drills and exercises. Use the PER4M Jump Trainer to increase both vertical and horizontal leaping ability. Increase lower body dynamic strength by adding resistance to drills and training workouts.



Add and remove up to 4 Power Tubes to increase or decrease the peak resistance force pulling against your body by simply clipping the heavy duty carabineer into place. The heavy duty construction of the padded adjustable belt and adjustable ankle straps mean your Jump Trainer will last longer, even under intense training programs. The backpack style carry bag is large enough to carry your Jump Trainer and your belongings, allowing you to take your training anywhere.



WHY THE PER4M JUMP TRAINER WORKS: Resistance training uses resistance or force to induce muscular contraction, which builds strength and anaerobic endurance. Resistance exercises also help you increase bone density, improve metabolism and decrease your risk of injury. The Jump Trainer helps incorporate the resistance training products into your Plyo-Training or Functional Training. Functional Training involves training the body to move in more than one plane of motion, which increase strength, improves balance and decreases your risk of injury when compared to fixed form movement. This type of training will also improve proprioception – your ability to sense the position of your body and limps in space – resulting in better sports and training performance. Using the Jump Trainer, in conjunction with functional training, will assist in increasing joint mobility and stability as well as developing more efficient motor patterns.



DRILL CARDS: Includes 10 instructional drill cards showing top drills to improve your vertical & horizontal leaping and movement.



PADDED ADJUSTABLE BELT & ANKLE STRAPS: The padded Adjustable Belt and Adjustable Ankle straps are extremely comfortable and wont rub and irritate skin during training. They both feature heavy duty padding and nylon webbing, which wont rip, which allows you to adjust tight against your body for a secure fit. Fits most sizes.



ANKLE STRAPS: The padded adjustable ankle straps fit securely around your upper ankle, while being held in place by the heavy duty nylon webbing which fits flat under the bottom of your show. This design allows you to explode through your movements while the ankle strap sit securely in place on your upper ankle and provides the support needed against your body.



HEAVY DUTY CONSTRUCTION: The Heavy Duty construction of the belt, ankle straps and all the hardware (clips, rings & carabineers) means product last longer under intense training environments. Longer lasting than competitive products due to quality of materials used.



QUICK RELEASE POWER TUBES: Includes four (4) durable latex tubes with quick release clips to easily add and remove resistance. Cables are approximately 14inches long when clipped into the Belt & Ankle Straps and can be stretched 3 times their length during explosive movements.



LARGE CARRY BAG: The large backpack carry bag is 23” H x 14” W; large enough to carry the Jump Trainer and your belongings wherever you train.



KIT INCLUDES:

 * Adjustable Padded Belt
 * Adjustable Ankle Straps
 * 4 Quick Release Power Tubes
 * 10 Drill Cards
 * Backpack Carry bag



Fits Most Sizes

Product Contains Latex
feature_bullets: Build explosive power and jumping ability! PER4M Jump Trainer maximizes your vertical and horizontal explosiveness by strengthening quads, hips and glutes. Increase lower body dynamic strength by adding resistance to drills and training workouts.
KIT INCLUDES: Adjustable Padded Belt; (2) Adjustable Ankle Straps; (4) Quick Release Power Tubes; 10 Drill Cards; Backpack Carry bag
DRILL CARDS: Includes 10 instructional training drill cards.

PADDED ADJUSTABLE BELT & ANKLE STRAPS: The padded Adjustable Belt and Adjustable Ankle straps wont irritate skin during training; heavy duty padding and construction wont rip; adjust for a tight/secure fit.
HEAVY DUTY CONSTRUCTION means product last longer under intense training environments.
QUICK RELEASE POWER TUBES: Includes four (4) durable latex tubes with quick release clips to easily add and remove resistance.
LARGE CARRY BAG: The backpack carry bag is large; carry the Jump Trainer and belongings wherever you train.
